org.apache.hadoop.service.launcher

接口 LauncherArguments

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ServiceLauncher

    public interface LauncherArguments
    Standard launcher arguments. These are all from the GenericOptionsParser, simply extracted to constants.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String ARG_CONF
      Name of the configuration argument on the CLI.
      static String ARG_CONF_PREFIXED
      prefixed version of ARG_CONF.
      static String ARG_CONF_SHORT 
      static String ARG_CONFCLASS
      Name of a configuration class which is loaded before any attempt is made to load the class.
      static String ARG_CONFCLASS_PREFIXED
      Prefixed version of ARG_CONFCLASS.
      static String ARG_CONFCLASS_SHORT 
      static String E_PARSE_FAILED
      Error string on a parse failure.

    • 字段详细资料

      • ARG_CONF

        static final String ARG_CONF
        Name of the configuration argument on the CLI. Value: "conf"
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ARG_CONF_SHORT

        static final String ARG_CONF_SHORT
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ARG_CONF_PREFIXED

        static final String ARG_CONF_PREFIXED
        prefixed version of ARG_CONF. Value: "--conf"
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ARG_CONFCLASS

        static final String ARG_CONFCLASS
        Name of a configuration class which is loaded before any attempt is made to load the class.

        Value: "hadoopconf"

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ARG_CONFCLASS_SHORT

        static final String ARG_CONFCLASS_SHORT
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ARG_CONFCLASS_PREFIXED

        static final String ARG_CONFCLASS_PREFIXED
        Prefixed version of ARG_CONFCLASS. Value: "--hadoopconf"
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • E_PARSE_FAILED

        static final String E_PARSE_FAILED
        Error string on a parse failure. Value: "Failed to parse: "
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
